DOC.brief_summary: Randomized trial compare double balloon catheter induction labor in- outpatient groups.Investigators assess feasibility , clinical effectiveness patient acceptability outpatient versus inpatient catheter induction labor .
DOC.brief_title: Outpatient Versus Inpatient Balloon Catheter Induction Labor
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study describe labor outcome woman double balloon induction catheter labor . Participants include woman uncomplicated singleton pregnancy ≥37- ≤41+5 week gestation . Patients randomize two group : one hundred randomize inpatient one hundred outpatient group . The main outcome measure pain evaluate VAS one , five , nine 13 hour placement double balloon induction catheter . The total hospital stay induction delivery interval time measure . Also mode birth well maternal neonatal morbidity patient satisfaction record .
DOC.criteria: uncomplicated pregnancy singleton pregnancy pregnancy week > 37 < 41+5 patient live 1/2 hour away hospital patient disease medication multiple pregnancy pregnancy week > 41+5 preterm rupture membrane patient live 1/2 hour away hospital
